and.name: Multi-artefact Management
and.description: High-level feature for managing multiple artefacts, integrating different management operations and approaches for optimal handling.

feature.name: Operations
feature.description: Defines the operations or actions that can be performed on multiple artefacts, ensuring the ability to manipulate artefacts effectively.

and.name: Artefacts
and.description: Refers to the artefacts being managed, which may include files, models, or data components that need to be handled in the multi-artefact management system.

and.name: Multi-modal
and.description: Supports various modes or methods of managing and interacting with artefacts, including visual, text-based, and graphical interfaces.

and.name: Approaches
and.description: Encompasses different strategies or methodologies used for multi-artefact management, such as systematic, flexible, or automated approaches.
